I have used 2006.4.21 BIRT to test this report document. It works well.

I think this bug is a duplicate of Bugzilla Bug 136786, 136948. I have fixed it on 2006.4.17.

If you have used old BIRT codes, please switch to current BIRT. 

Please let me know the result of using current BIRT codes. If it works well, I will make this bug fixed. If it can not work, then give me your design file and I will test it.

Thanks!

I have gotten the email from ChengHsi Yang, and ChengHsi has used BIRT 2.1RC1a dated 4/24/2005 to test this bug. It works well.

So, this bug has been fixed.
